name: Tsukimi
description:
Tsukimi is an exploration game set in an enchanted Japanese garden. Collect offerings from shrines and offer them to a deity to finish the game, or just enjoy the atmosphere. 

Screenshots:

Controls: 

Movement - WASD

Sprint - Shift

Jump - Space

Interact - Left Click

Zoom - Right Click

Gameplay Notes: 

Click on objects to interact or pickup. Picked up items are task options and will make a note sound. Click on signposts to  get task hints.

Notes: 

FPS and Performance may be lower on lower end devices. It runs 100+ fps on my laptop consistently but could drop to 75 fps on some areas. 

Credits:

First Person Drifter by Ben Esposito

http://www.torahhorse.com/index.php/portfolio/first-person-drifter-for-unity/

Music by Adrian Von Ziegler

Sounds found on Soundsnap

All textures are painted on Photoshop by Josevan Danusastra

All models are made in Maya by Josevan Danusastra
